name: Burden of Guilt (Adept)

perks.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
perks.name: Elemental Capacitor

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.
perks.name: Well-Rounded

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.
perks.name: High-Impact Reserves

perks.description: Direct hits with the top half of the magazine cause a detonation that slows nearby targets.
perks.name: Chill Clip

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.
perks.name: Vorpal Weapon

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: Gain increased reload, stability, aim assist, and range when you are the last living member of your fireteam or running solo.
perks.name: Alacrity

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when out of combat.
perks.name: One Quiet Moment
